description: Are you thinking about starting your own aquarium? Do you know how to raise a healthy happy fish? Do you really trust the typical mega-pet-store staff to recommend a good beginner fish? Before going into a store use this ebook to give you a good head start on setting up an aquarium. Go to the store informed with the right questions. If we define a good beginner's fish as one that is easy to feed and care for, hardy, able to live in a variety of water conditions, and attractive, then there are a number of widely available fish which fit the bill nicely. Many of these are regularly sold as beginner's fish. But watch out! Many of the fish sold as beginner's fish really are not well suited to that role. Download your guide to avoiding failure with your fish.
